title: Method for manufacturing lithium-ion secondary batteries and active material

events.title: Application filed by Toyota Motor Corp

classifications.description: Selection of substances as active materials, active masses, active liquids of inorganic oxides or hydroxides for non-aqueous cells
Rocking-chair batteries, i.e. batteries with lithium insertion or intercalation in both electrodes; Lithium-ion batteries
Compounds containing nickel, with or without oxygen or hydrogen, and containing two or more other elements
Electrodes based on mixed oxides or hydroxides, or on mixtures of oxides or hydroxides, e.g. LiCoOx

Selection of substances as active materials, active masses, active liquids of inorganic oxides or hydroxides of mixed oxides or hydroxides for inserting or intercalating light metals, e.g. LiTi2O4 or LiTi2OxFy

claims:
活物質を含む電極を備えるリチウムイオン二次電池であって、
  前記活物質は表面に、金属酸化物を含む金属酸化物層と、リチウムイオン伝導体を含むイオン伝導層との二つの被覆層を備えており、
  前記金属酸化物層と前記イオン伝導層とは隣接しており、
            
              前記金属酸化物層は、９０質量％以上が金属酸化物により構成されており、
            
              前記イオン伝導層は、９０質量％以上がリチウムイオン伝導体により構成されている、
            
リチウムイオン二次電池。
A lithium-ion secondary battery equipped with an electrode containing an active material. The active material has two coating layers on its surface, a metal oxide layer containing a metal oxide and an ionic conduction layer containing a lithium ion conductor. The metal oxide layer and the ionic conduction layer are adjacent to each other and are adjacent to each other.  The metal oxide layer is composed of 90% by mass or more of the metal oxide.  90% by mass or more of the ion conductive layer is composed of a lithium ion conductor.  Lithium-ion secondary battery.

前記金属酸化物は、酸化チタン、酸化アルミニウム、二酸化ケイ素、および酸化タングステンからなる群から選択される少なくとも１種を含む、請求項１に記載のリチウムイオン二次電池。

  The lithium ion secondary battery according to claim 1, wherein the metal oxide contains at least one selected from the group consisting of titanium oxide, aluminum oxide, silicon dioxide, and tungsten oxide.

前記リチウムイオン伝導体は、リン酸リチウム、硫酸リチウム、タングステン酸リチウム、ケイ酸リチウム、コバルト酸リチウム、アルミン酸リチウム、およびチタン酸リチウムからなる群から選択される少なくとも１種を含む、請求項１または２に記載のリチウムイオン二次電池。

  The lithium ion conductor comprises at least one selected from the group consisting of lithium phosphate, lithium sulfate, lithium tungstate, lithium silicate, lithium cobalt oxide, lithium aluminate, and lithium titanate, claim 1. Or the lithium ion secondary battery according to 2.

前記金属酸化物の中心元素の電気陰性度をχＭ’、前記リチウムイオン伝導体の中心元素の電気陰性度をχ
             Ｍ とするとき、これらはχ
             Ｍ 
            ＞χ
             Ｍ’ を満たす、請求項１～３のいずれか１項に記載のリチウムイオン二次電池。
When the electronegativity of the central element of the metal oxide is χ M'and the electronegativity of the central element of the lithium ion conductor is χ  M  , they satisfy χ  M  > χ  M'  , claims 1 to 1. The lithium ion secondary battery according to any one of 3.

前記活物質を１００質量部としたとき、前記イオン伝導層の割合は、０．０５質量部以上５質量部以下である、請求項１～４のいずれか１項に記載のリチウムイオン二次電池。

  The lithium ion secondary battery according to any one of claims 1 to 4, wherein the ratio of the ion conductive layer is 0.05 parts by mass or more and 5 parts by mass or less when the active material is 100 parts by mass. ..
